articles.title: ‘We’ll see how it plays out’: Caleb Durbin, Marcelo Mayer each to practice at 2B, 3B to begin spring training
articles.description:
Manager Alex Cora reiterated that he's been "through this dance" last year, in regard to determining who will play third base.

The post ‘We’ll see how it plays out’: Caleb Durbin, Marcelo Mayer each to practice at 2B, 3B to begin spring training appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Caleb Durbin and Marcelo Mayer will practice at second and third base during spring training.
Manager Alex Cora emphasizes the importance of evaluating infield positions, similar to last year's process.
Boston Red Sox fans can expect competitive infield dynamics as roster decisions unfold.

articles.title: Journalist Don Lemon pleads not guilty to civil rights charges in Minnesota church protest
articles.description:
Dozens of supporters gathered outside the courthouse, chanting “Pam Bondi has got to go” and “Protect the press.”

The post Journalist Don Lemon pleads not guilty to civil rights charges in Minnesota church protest appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Don Lemon pleads not guilty to civil rights charges related to a protest.
Supporters gathered outside the courthouse, chanting against Pam Bondi.
The case highlights ongoing tensions around press freedom in Boston and beyond.

articles.title: Judge gives the US 2 weeks to retrieve student deported to Honduras while traveling for Thanksgiving
articles.description:
Lopez Belloza, who has no criminal history, was detained at Boston's airport Nov. 20 as she prepared to fly home to Texas for the holiday.

The post Judge gives the US 2 weeks to retrieve student deported to Honduras while traveling for Thanksgiving appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lopez Belloza was detained at Boston's airport on November 20 while traveling for Thanksgiving.
A judge has given the US two weeks to retrieve her from Honduras.
The case highlights ongoing concerns about immigration enforcement affecting Boston students.
